lines.text: Maybe... the <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard</c> wasn't the only one with a stone coat!
If the <c=#FF0000>Go Wizard</c> was encased, too, the bullet could've ricocheted off!
Well, yeah, 'cause the force of the gunshot shattered it off.
Then how come there's no shattered wizard mold around him?
And how come he's dead, for that matter?
